enWisdom: One who is ignorant of [a branch of] knowledge is hostile towards it
Man is an enemy of that which he is ignorant of

Wisdom: الْجَاهِلُ لَا يَعْرِفُ الْعَالِمَ لِأَنَّهُ لَمْ يَكُنْ قَبْلُ عَالِماً
enWisdom: The ignorant person does not understand the learned because he [himself] was never learned before

Wisdom: الْجَاهِلُ يَسْتَوْحِشُ مِمَّا يَأْنَسُ بِهِ الْحَكِيمُ [الْحَلِيمُ‏]
enWisdom: The ignorant person feels aversion towards that which the wise person feels at ease with
